mutants.code:
def encrypt_string(S: str) -> str:
    arr = list(S)
    ans = []
    char = arr[0]
    count = 2
    for i in range(1, len(arr) + 1):
        if i == len(arr):
            ans.append(char)
            ans.append(hex(count)[2:])
            break
        if arr[i] == char:
            count += 1
        else:
            ans.append(char)
            ans.append(hex(count)[2:])
            count = 1
            char = arr[i]
    ans = ans[::-1]
    encrypted_string = ''.join(ans)
    return encrypted_string

    encrypted_string = ''.join(ans)
    return encrypted_string

def encrypt_string(S: str) -> str:
    arr = list(S)
    ans = []
    char = arr[0]
    count = 1
    for i in range(1, len(arr) + 1):
        if i == len(arr):
            ans.append(char)
            ans.append(hex(count)[2:])
            break
        if arr[i] == char:
            count += 1
        else:
            ans.append(char)
            ans.append(hex(count)[-2:])
            count = 1
            char = arr[i]
    ans = ans[::-1]
    encrypted_string = ''.join(ans)
    return encrypted_string
